# Templates Documentation

This folder contains documentation for the Template Builder system, which enables users to create reusable, data-driven report templates using Handlebars syntax.

## Contents

- **`template-builder-complete.md`** - Complete documentation for the Template Builder feature, including architecture, features, user guide, technical implementation, API reference, and roadmap. This is the main reference document.

- **`TEMPLATE_BUILDER_README.md`** - Additional README documentation for the Template Builder, providing supplementary information and guidance.

## Key Features

The Template Builder enables:
- Full rich text editor for creating templates
- Handlebars variables for dynamic data insertion
- Conditionals and loops for conditional rendering
- Live preview with realistic mock data
- Auto-save functionality
- 20+ helper functions for dates, currency, formatting, and survey-specific operations

## Related Documentation

- **Reports**: `/docs/reports/` - Report generation and building survey reports
- **Editor**: `/docs/editor/` - Document editor that uses templates
